    Guest Speakers

    Throughout the course, a series of guest speakers will join the class to give talks on their research, their jobs, and how they think about science

    • Guest Speakers
      • Dr. Shannon M. Hennessey
      • Emma Atkinson
      • TBD
      • Dr. Karlisa Calwood

    During the course we have some excellent guest speakers lined up to discuss a variety of topics with us, including their research, how they got their jobs and what is it they actually “do”, and their philosophies of science.

    Along with the associated assignment, please come prepared ready to ask questions of the speaker - they are here for you to learn from!

    Confirmed Speakers:

    Emma M. Atkinson

    Emma is a PhD student at the University of Alberta with Dr. Mark Lewis.

    Dr. Shannon M. Hennessey

    Dr. Hennessey completed her PhD at Oregon State University.
